Uses of Interface
com.xuggle.mediatool.IMediaListener

Packages that use IMediaListener
com.xuggle.mediatool A simple API for to decoding, viewing and encoding media: tutorial here; start with ToolFactory. 
com.xuggle.mediatool.demos MediaTool Demonstration applications used by the MediaTool tutorials. 
 

Uses of IMediaListener in com.xuggle.mediatool
 

Subinterfaces of IMediaListener in com.xuggle.mediatool
 interface IMediaDebugListener
          An IMediaListener that logs counts of different events to a log file.
 interface IMediaTool
          An IMediaGenerator that does work in reaction to other IMediaGenerator objects.
 interface IMediaViewer
          EXPERIMENTAL ONLY: An IMediaListener that plays audio, video or both, while listening to a IMediaGenerator that produces raw media.
 interface IMediaWriter
          An IMediaCoder that encodes and decodes media to an IContainer, and can optionally read data for encoding from other IMediaGenerator objects.
 

Classes in com.xuggle.mediatool that implement IMediaListener
 class MediaListenerAdapter
          An implementation of IMediaListener that implements all methods as empty methods.
 class MediaToolAdapter
          An implementation of IMediaTool that forwards all IMediaListener events to listeners registered with MediaToolAdapter.addListener(IMediaListener).

          Get a read-only collection of added IMediaListener objects.
 Collection<IMediaListener> AMediaGeneratorMixin.getListeners()
          Get a read-only collection of added IMediaListener objects.
 Collection<IMediaListener> IMediaGenerator.getListeners()
          Get the list of existing media tools listeners.
 Collection<IMediaListener> MediaGeneratorAdapter.getListeners()
          Get a read-only collection of added IMediaListener objects.

          Adds this listener to a thread-safe set.

          Adds this listener to a thread-safe set.
 boolean IMediaGenerator.addListener(IMediaListener listener)
          Add a media tool listener.
 boolean MediaGeneratorAdapter.addListener(IMediaListener listener)
          Adds this listener to a thread-safe set.
 boolean MediaToolAdapter.removeListener(IMediaListener listener)
          Remove this listener from the thread-safe set of IMediaListener objects.
 boolean AMediaGeneratorMixin.removeListener(IMediaListener listener)
          Remove this listener from the thread-safe set of IMediaListener objects.

          Remove a media tool listener.
 boolean MediaGeneratorAdapter.removeListener(IMediaListener listener)

Uses of IMediaListener in com.xuggle.mediatool.demos
 

Classes in com.xuggle.mediatool.demos that implement IMediaListener
 class DecodeAndCaptureFrames
          Using IMediaReader, takes a media container, finds the first video stream, decodes that stream, and then writes video frames out to a PNG image file every 5 seconds, based on the video presentation timestamps.
 class DecodeAndPlayAudioAndVideo
          Using IMediaReader, takes a media container, finds the first video stream, decodes that stream, and then plays the audio and video.
